sub_fields.label: Caption background
sub_fields.name: home_banners_caption_background
sub_fields.instructions: Is the text conflicting with the background? Add a solid background behind the caption.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: home_banners_image
sub_fields.instructions: Upload the image you'd like as the background.

sub_fields.label: Custom HTML
sub_fields.name: home_banners_custom_html
sub_fields.instructions: Add custom html here, it will be added within the wrapper but you can manually move change where this box spits out under the banner module in the extensions folder.

sub_fields.label: Overlay Colour
sub_fields.name: home_banners_overlay_colour
sub_fields.instructions: Choose a colour you'd like the overlay to be. This will NOT work if opacity is set to 0.

sub_fields.label: Overlay Opacity
sub_fields.name: home_banners_overlay_opacity
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a number between 0 & 1 to control the opacity of the banner. For eg. 0.5 will make it semi transparent and 1 will make it solid.

sub_fields.label: Custom Overlay code
sub_fields.name: home_banners_custom_overlay_code
sub_fields.instructions:
You can replace the overlay settings by pasting your own code here.
Example: background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.8) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.0) 50%, rgba(14,18,55,1) 100%);

sub_fields.label: Alt Image
sub_fields.name: home_banners_alt_image
sub_fields.instructions: Videos don't always work on mobile browsers so adding a alt image is useful.

fields.label: Autoplay
fields.name: home_banners_autoplay
fields.instructions: Enable this if you'd like the banners to scroll automatically.

fields.label: Autoplay Speed
fields.name: home_banners_autoplay_speed
fields.instructions: Please specify in milliseconds the speed of the autoplay. eg. 2000 for the slide to change every two seconds. Minimum value 1000

fields.label: Dots
fields.name: home_banners_dots
fields.instructions: Enable if you'd like to show pagination dots on the banner.

fields.label: Disable Dragging
fields.name: home_banners_draggable
fields.instructions: Switch this on if you'd like to disable the user being able to drag the banners.

fields.label: Disable Pause on hover
fields.name: home_banners_pause_on_hover
fields.instructions: Switch this on if you'd like the banners to carry on sliding on hover.

fields.label: Image position
fields.name: inner_banner_image_position
fields.instructions:
What position do you want the image? For eg. center top.
Leave blank for default

fields.label: Image
fields.name: inner_banner_image
fields.instructions: Upload a image you'd like the banner to have.

fields.label: Height
fields.name: inner_banner_height
fields.instructions: You can specify a height for the inner banner here. Bear in mind this works like percentages, 100 will mean it will cover the screen.

fields.label: Overlay Colour
fields.name: inner_banner_overlay_colour
fields.instructions: Choose a colour you'd like the overlay to be. This will NOT work if opacity is set to 0.

fields.label: Overlay Opacity
fields.name: inner_banner_overlay_opacity
fields.instructions: Enter a number between 0 & 1 to control the opacity of the banner. For eg. 0.5 will make it semi transparent and 1 will make it solid.

fields.label: Custom Overlay code
fields.name: inner_banner_custom_overlay_code
fields.instructions:
You can replace the overlay settings by pasting your own code here.
Example: background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(0,0,0,0.8) 0%, rgba(0,0,0,0.0) 50%, rgba(14,18,55,1) 100%);

sub_fields.label: Icon
sub_fields.name: social_media_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Pick an icon from https://fontawesome.com/icons/ and paste the class here. For eg: 'fab fa-facebook-square'.
